{"id":489083697,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620195493,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/489083697/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& num) {\n        int f=0;\n        int m=num.size();\n        int tmp;\n        for(int i=1;i<m;i++){\n            if(num[i]<num[i-1]){\n                f++;\n                tmp=i-1;\n            }\n        }\n        if(tmp+1>=num.size()) num[tmp]=num[tmp-1];\n        else if(tmp-1<0) num[tmp]=num[tmp+1];\n        else{\n            num[tmp]=(num[tmp-1]+num[tmp+1])/2;\n        }\n        if(f>=2) return false;\n        else{\n            for(int i=1;i<m;i++){\n                if(num[i]<num[i-1]){\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n            return true;\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
